alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Cowley; Harper; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 12 at 2:42AM CST until March 13 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR EXTREME GRASSLAND FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 091...092...093 AND 098... The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a Fire Weather Watch for extreme grassland fire danger, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * Extreme Grassland Fire Danger...Is possible. * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 16 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly and become very difficult to control. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this fire weather product.
